articles.description: Actor R Madhavan has revealed that he was the first choice for 2005 Tamil film 'Ghajini' but rejected it because he did not like the story.
articles.content:
Actor R Madhavan has revealed that he was the first choice for 2005 Tamil film 'Ghajini' but rejected it because he did not like the story.

articles.author: Jacob Kastrenakes
articles.title: Minecraft adds tribute to Technoblade after streamer's death - The Verge
articles.description: Minecraft was updated with a tribute to Technoblade, a popular YouTuber and streamer who died from cancer. The game’s launcher now features a pig wearing a crown.
articles.content:
A crowned pig to represent Technoblades character
The launcher image for Minecraft: Java Edition.
Image: Microsoft
